column1: '''Ferumbras Took II''' was a [[Thain]] of [[the Shire]].
Ferumbras was the oldest son of [[Thain]] [[Isumbras Took III
column2: Isumbras III]], though in fame he was outshone by his younger brother, [[Bandobras Took
column3: Bandobras]], who moved to the [[Northfarthing]] and won the [[Battle of Greenfields]]. Ferumbras instead became Thain, and was succeeded in turn by his son [[Fortinbras Took II

column2: Ferumbras]] is a name from the [[wikipedia:Roland
column3: legends of Roland]], a corruption of Frankish ''fier Ã  bras'', "brave arm".
